question:
Write a letter to a restaurant manager to organize a party
Why you want to give the party?
What special arrangements you will need?
Any relevant questions
text: With immense pleasure and excitement,  Susmita Das am looking forward to arranging a birthday party at your restaurant.

As stated earlier, I would like to inform you that there will be a celebration of our birthday party jointly where I am inviting my three college friends. As this is also our reunion after 3 years, I want to make it a special one under your hostage.

Regarding special arrangements, I would like to decorate the hall rooms with birthday balloons, cards and festoons. Apart from this, the floor should be equipped with live music from any renowned musician to create a soft and musical ambience. Additionally, one of my friends loves to eat mutton, so kindly be advised to add a few mutton items in the wish grill of the main course.
At last, I would like to know the method of advance booking and payment in detail. I am really wishing that the party will be a blissful memory for us with your amazing service.
